notes.noteText: I accused Hilario, and he was not the culprit.
Ubaldo was released from prison on, 2010/3/29, and has a history of committing similar crimes, Extortion. He is the second most likely suspect.
Jordane was released from prison on, 2008/9/13, and has a history of committing similar crimes, Burglary. He is the next most likely suspect. He also only has one alibi of cleaning his fireplace.

Adah was released from prison on, 2005/11/6, and has a history of committing similar crimes, Burglary. She is the next most likely suspect. Also has a history of drug abuse, "watching the pink and purple elephants fly."
Michel was released from prison on, 2013/11/21, and has a history of committing similar crimes, Grand Theft. He is the next most likely suspect.
Emerson was released from prison on, 2010/5/9, and has a history of committing similar crimes, Grand Theft. He is the next most likely suspect.
Nathanael was released from prison on, 2013/6/20, and has a history of committing similar crimes, Theft. He is the next most likely suspect.
Gavin was released from prison on, 2009/1/24, and has a history of committing similar crimes, Theft. He is the next most likely suspect.
Kieran was released from prison on, 2015/7/25, and has a history of committing similar crimes, Grand Theft. Only has one alibi, cooking dinner. She is the next most likely suspect.
Madelyn was released from prison on, 2013/8/15, and has a history of committing similar crimes, Grand Theft. Only has one alibi, Getting married. She is the next most likely suspect.
Louisa was released from prison on, 2008/10/12, and has a history of committing similar crimes, Grand Theft. Only has one alibi, Listening To Heavy Metal. She is the next most likely suspect.
Sabrina was released from prison on, 2002/1/1, and has a history of committing similar crimes, Theft. She is the next most likely suspect.
